_sText:
SURF_ARENA-FIGHTER_V1

This map is one of my best surf maps. There is 4 "main" ramps that takes you to the side ramps, there is an boost in every main ramp. There four platforms that have teleports, each takes you to the top (Top = over spawns, under jail). There is NO guns anywhere, because this map is designed for DM/Surf server only. Or you can surf it but with knife and pistol only, lol. ;P If you fall off the ramps you're taken to jail, but you can jump out from the jail.

Please, assess and comment!!!
